name: it's not that deep
description:
The #1 game designed to ignite the conversation. It’s free, for 99 cents. Free of signup. Free of unwanted advertising. Free of bs.

It’s not that deep, the person to person connection app with no apologies. Use it on a date, out at a bar, or at home with friends. We help you break the ice, the rest is up to you. With questions that are bold, engaging, connection sparking, raucous, and thought provoking; the provocative is now approachable. Instead of scrolling or swiping by yourself, be in the now. There are awesome humans everywhere. Don’t wait to connect or for the “right” thing to say. Take your floaties off and jump head first into the deep end, it’s time to get weird. You in?

- swipe through question cards in the direction that matches your choice.
-see what percentage of people agree with your answer
-customize your own collection of favorite cards
- keep track of how many questions you have answered
- loathe the cards you don't want and they go away forever
-switch between different moods
-get weird
